name: Black Sun Priestess
description: The Black Sun Priestess is a humanoid figure clad in hide armor, wielding a greatclub with notable physical prowess and potent magical abilities.
memorable: Her ability to see through magical darkness and her potent array of spells makes her a daunting presence in any dark environment.
goals: To exert her will through manipulation and subversion, often using dark magic to combat her foes.
relations: She may serve or be associated with other chaotic evil entities, possibly leading undead minions raised from the dead.
environment: Often found in dark, foreboding places, particularly where she can use her abilities to their fullest.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution scores enhance her combat capabilities, alongside effective spellcasting.
weaknesses: Light sensitivity causes significant drawbacks in bright conditions, making her less effective in well-lit areas.
attacks: Engages in combat using a greatclub, dealing bludgeoning damage while utilizing spells that curse and control the battlefield.
most_powerful_ability: Her ability to animate dead brings powerful undead under her control, turning fallen foes into allies.
senses: Possesses darkvision, allowing her to see in darkness up to 60 feet without impairment.
skills: Proficient in insight and intimidation, with a strong ability to influence and read others.
additional_information: Can see through magical darkness with Black Sun Sight.
Aggressive ability allows rapid movement towards enemies.
Spellcasting includes a diverse range of offensive and defensive spells.
Vulnerability to bright light imposes significant combat disadvantages.
Her presence is felt strongly in both melee and spellcasting scenarios.
spellcasting: Strong spellcaster with access to various cleric spells, specializing in curses and battlefield control.
